sentence.Network_en: Yet for some reason, he always felt this " little - girlishness " did not quite suit her.
sentence.Network_cn: 可是不知怎样, 他老觉得这种小妞儿腔跟苏小姐不顶配.

list.abs: girlish games , behaviour , laughter ., 女孩子的游戏 , 举止 , 笑声.
girlish charm ; a dress too schoolgirlish for office wear .少女的魅力；太过学生化的职业装。
She engages everyone with her pretty girlish ways ., 她以漂亮的少女风度迷住了大家.
she was filled to the brim with girlish glee ., 她充满了少女的喜悦.

auth_sentence.content: She was all girlishness, and playfulness, and wildness, and kittenish buoyancy.

auth_sentence.content: He was decidedly misogynist, and yet he not only chose a girl; he stressed her girlishness.
